00001 /* vsprintf.c -- Lars Wirzenius & Linus Torvalds. */
00002 /*
00003  * Wirzenius wrote this portably, Torvalds fucked it up :-)
00004  */
00005 
00006 #include <vsprintf.h>
00007 
00008 /* we use this so that we can do without the ctype library */
00009 #define is_digit(c)     ((c) >= '0' && (c) <= '9')
00010 
00011 static int skip_atoi(const char **s)
00012 {
00013         int i=0;
00014 
00015         while (is_digit(**s))
00016                 i = i*10 + *((*s)++) - '0';
00017         return i;
00018 }
00019 
00020 #define ZEROPAD 1               /* pad with zero */
00021 #define SIGN      2   /* unsigned/signed long */
00022 #define PLUS    4         /* show plus */
00023 #define SPACE     8   /* space if plus */
00024 #define LEFT      16  /* left justified */
00025 #define SPECIAL 32  /* 0x */
00026 #define SMALL     64  /* use 'abcdef' instead of 'ABCDEF' */
00027 
00028 #define do_div(n,base) ({ \
00029 int __res; \
00030 __asm__("divl %4":"=a" (n),"=d" (__res):"0" (n),"1" (0),"r" (base)); \
00031 __res; })
00032 
00033 static char * number(char * str, int num, int base, int size, int precision
00034         ,int type)
00035 {
00036         char c,sign,tmp[36];
00037         const char *digits="0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ";
00038         int i;
00039 
00040         if (type&SMALL) digits="0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
00041         if (type&LEFT) type &= ~ZEROPAD;
00042         if (base<2 || base>36)
00043                 return 0;
00044         c = (type & ZEROPAD) ? '0' : ' ' ;
00045         if (type&SIGN && num<0) {
00046                 sign='-';
00047                 num = -num;
00048         } else
00049                 sign=(type&PLUS) ? '+' : ((type&SPACE) ? ' ' : 0);
00050         if (sign) size--;
00051         if (type&SPECIAL)
00052                 if (base==16) size -= 2;
00053                 else if (base==8) size--;
00054         i=0;
00055         if (num==0)
00056                 tmp[i++]='0';
00057         else while (num!=0)
00058                 tmp[i++]=digits[do_div(num,base)];
00059         if (i>precision) precision=i;
00060         size -= precision;
00061         if (!(type&(ZEROPAD+LEFT)))
00062                 while(size-->0)
00063                         *str++ = ' ';
00064         if (sign)
00065                 *str++ = sign;
00066         if (type&SPECIAL)
00067                 if (base==8)
00068                         *str++ = '0';
00069                 else if (base==16) {
00070                         *str++ = '0';
00071                         *str++ = digits[33];
00072                 }
00073         if (!(type&LEFT))
00074                 while(size-->0)
00075                         *str++ = c;
00076         while(i<precision--)
00077                 *str++ = '0';
00078         while(i-->0)
00079                 *str++ = tmp[i];
00080         while(size-->0)
00081                 *str++ = ' ';
00082         return str;
00083 }
00084 
00085 int vsprintf(char * buf, const char * fmt, va_list args)
00086 {
00087         int len;
00088         int i;
00089         char * str;
00090         char *s;
00091         int *ip;
00092 
00093         int flags;              /* flags to number() */
00094 
00095         int field_width;        /* width of output field */
00096         int precision;          /* min. # of digits for integers; max
00097                                    number of chars for from string */
00098         int qualifier;          /* 'h', 'l', or 'L' for integer fields */
00099 
00100         for (str=buf ; *fmt ; ++fmt) {
00101                 if (*fmt != '%') {
00102                         *str++ = *fmt;
00103                         continue;
00104                 }
00105                         
00106                 /* process flags */
00107                 flags = 0;
00108                 repeat:
00109                         ++fmt;          /* this also skips first '%' */
00110                         switch (*fmt) {
00111                                 case '-': flags |= LEFT; goto repeat;
00112                                 case '+': flags |= PLUS; goto repeat;
00113                                 case ' ': flags |= SPACE; goto repeat;
00114                                 case '#': flags |= SPECIAL; goto repeat;
00115                                 case '0': flags |= ZEROPAD; goto repeat;
00116                                 }
00117                 
00118                 /* get field width */
00119                 field_width = -1;
00120                 if (is_digit(*fmt))
00121                         field_width = skip_atoi(&fmt);
00122                 else if (*fmt == '*') {
00123                         /* it's the next argument */
00124                         field_width = (int) va_arg(args, int);
00125                         if (field_width < 0) {
00126                                 field_width = -field_width;
00127                                 flags |= LEFT;
00128                         }
00129                 }
00130 
00131                 /* get the precision */
00132                 precision = -1;
00133                 if (*fmt == '.') {
00134                         ++fmt;  
00135                         if (is_digit(*fmt))
00136                                 precision = skip_atoi(&fmt);
00137                         else if (*fmt == '*') {
00138                                 /* it's the next argument */
00139                                 precision = va_arg(args, int);
00140                         }
00141                         if (precision < 0)
00142                                 precision = 0;
00143                 }
00144 
00145                 /* get the conversion qualifier */
00146                 qualifier = -1;
00147                 if (*fmt == 'h' || *fmt == 'l' || *fmt == 'L') {
00148                         qualifier = *fmt;
00149                         ++fmt;
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 switch (*fmt) {
00153                 case 'c':
00154                         if (!(flags & LEFT))
00155                                 while (--field_width > 0)
00156                                         *str++ = ' ';
00157                         *str++ = (unsigned char) va_arg(args, int);
00158                         while (--field_width > 0)
00159                                 *str++ = ' ';
00160                         break;
00161 
00162                 case 's':
00163                         s = va_arg(args, char *);
00164                         len = strlen(s);
00165                         if (precision < 0)
00166                                 precision = len;
00167                         else if (len > precision)
00168                                 len = precision;
00169 
00170                         if (!(flags & LEFT))
00171                                 while (len < field_width--)
00172                                         *str++ = ' ';
00173                         for (i = 0; i < len; ++i)
00174                                 *str++ = *s++;
00175                         while (len < field_width--)
00176                                 *str++ = ' ';
00177                         break;
00178 
00179                 case 'o':
00180                         str = number(str, va_arg(args, unsigned long), 8,
00181                                 field_width, precision, flags);
00182                         break;
00183 
00184                 case 'p':
00185                         if (field_width == -1) {
00186                                 field_width = 8;
00187                                 flags |= ZEROPAD;
00188                         }
00189                         str = number(str,
00190                                 (unsigned long) va_arg(args, void *), 16,
00191                                 field_width, precision, flags);
00192                         break;
00193 
00194                 case 'x':
00195                         flags |= SMALL;
00196                 case 'X':
00197                         str = number(str, va_arg(args, unsigned long), 16,
00198                                 field_width, precision, flags);
00199                         break;
00200 
00201                 case 'd':
00202                 case 'i':
00203                         flags |= SIGN;
00204                 case 'u':
00205                         str = number(str, va_arg(args, unsigned long), 10,
00206                                 field_width, precision, flags);
00207                         break;
00208                 case 'b':
00209                         str = number(str, va_arg(args, unsigned long), 2,
00210                                 field_width, precision, flags);
00211                         break;
00212 
00213                 case 'n':
00214                         ip = va_arg(args, int *);
00215                         *ip = (str - buf);
00216                         break;
00217 
00218                 default:
00219                         if (*fmt != '%')
00220                                 *str++ = '%';
00221                         if (*fmt)
00222                                 *str++ = *fmt;
00223                         else
00224                                 --fmt;
00225                         break;
00226                 }
00227         }
00228         *str = '\0';
00229         return str-buf;
00230 }
